# Preface {-}

Many data scientist always stick to their preferred algorithm for machine learning without considering alternatives. This book is a guide to identifying suitable alternatives to better meet the use case needs. Learn new algorithms that you have never used before, familiarize yourself with their advantages and disadvantages to find the Chosen One.
